Guru SD Jadi Tersangka Pembakar Lahan di Rohil Riau
07 Nov 2019, 21:21 by Chaidir Anwar Tanjung
Pekanbaru -
Seorang guru SD berinisial S (48) menjadi tersangka kebakaran lahan di Rokan Hilir (Rohil) Riau. Lahan yang terbakar seluas setengah hektare.
"Kita sudah melakukan pemeriksaan dan menetapkan S sebagai tersangka. Lokasi kebakaran berada di Desa Suak Temenggung, Kecamatan Pekaitan," kata Kapolres Muhammad Mustofa kepada wartawan, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Kebakaran lahan ini diketahui pada Selasa (5/11). Saat itu anggota kepolisian Brigadir Bunga Simanjuntak tengah melakukan patroli rutin.
"Ketika patroli petugas melihat adanya kepulan asap dan langsung menuju ke titik lokasi. Di sana terlihat adanya api di lahan perkebunan sawit. Pelaku merupakan seorang guru SD," kata Mustofa.
Di lokasi, polisi mengamankan pelaku. Lahan terbakar luasnya setengah hektare.

Elementary School Teacher Becomes a Field-Burner in Rohil, Riau
Nov 7 2019, 21:21 by Chaidir Anwar Tanjung
Pekanbaru -
An elementary school teacher with the initial S (48) is a suspect in a land fire in Rokan Hilir (Rohil) Riau. The burned land is half an hectare wide.
"We have examined and named S as a suspect. The location of the fire was in the Village of Suak Temenggung, Pekaitan District," Kapolres Muhammad Mustofa told reporters on Thursday (11/07/2019).
This land fire was discovered on Tuesday (5/11). At that time police officer Brigadier Bunga Simanjuntak was conducting a routine patrol.
"When the patrol officers saw a puff of smoke and headed straight to the location. There was a fire on a palm oil plantation. The perpetrator was an elementary school teacher," Mustofa said.
At the location, the police secured the perpetrators. The area burned is half an hectare wide.
